prod_desc: Hop aboard My First Train Set for beginning builder fun!
prod_long_desc:
Introduce your child to the world of trains and building with the LEGO® DUPLO® My First Train Set. Create the colorful steam train with sound effects, a passenger wagon, station with ticket window, fueling pump and signal. With a lot of DUPLO bricks and track, it's the perfect set for budding builders and hours of train-themed creative play. Requires 3 AA (1.5V) batteries (not included). Includes train driver and child DUPLO figures.
A colorful, easy-to-build train set and station for hours of creative roleplay!
Includes train driver & child LEGO DUPLO figures
LEGO DUPLO building toys are compatible with all LEGO DUPLO & LEGO construction sets for creative building
Train track is over 68” long & 29” wide when built. Train is over 3” high, 11” long and 2” wide. Station is over 7” high, 7” long and 2” wide
52 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 2 and 5 years old
